update post set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author_url = #{authorUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author_url_md5 = #{authorUrlMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reply_num = #{replyNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, last_reply_time = #{lastReplyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into post (title,url,author,author_url,author_url_md5,type,reply_num,last_reply_time,add_time) values
(#{item.title},#{item.url},#{item.author},#{item.authorUrl},#{item.authorUrlMd5},#{item.type},#{item.replyNum},#{item.lastReplyTime},#{item.addTime})
on duplicate key update title=values(title),url=values(url),author=values(author),author_url=values(author_url),author_url_md5=values(author_url_md5),type=values(type),reply_num=values(reply_num),last_reply_time=values(last_reply_time)
